title: Where are the keys at?
body: So, its been MONTHS since I have gotten a single key fragment. Before the whole honor system was implemented, it was easy to get keys. Chests came in frequent enough that it drew me back to the game after a year hiatus as it as a nice feeling of progress. Now, it seems like it is impossible to gain any key fragments. I am not being toxic, I am very frequently getting honored and giving out honors, not to mention playing at my peak in a while, but it seems like the fragments are just not being fairly dispersed. I think the change to have them link with honor as a player is a great idea in concept but is lacking in fairness. It feels like the standards to get key fragments are too strict and perhaps a balance between some key fragments based on performance and some on honor as a player is the best fix. I've heard about a system that automatically gives you keys after a period of time but I have NO clue how long it is considering I have literally not seen a key fragment for MONTHS (talking about 3-4 atleast)! I have chests piling up but it is SO frustrating to not be able to touch them! PLEASE MAKE SOME CHANGES!

replies.body: I was able to check up on this for you, and it looks like this account is still at honor rank 0 from having displayed dishonorable behavior. You'll need to show consistent improvement in order to rise back up in honor ranks before you'll be able to earn loot again. If you aren't sure about why you're at this rank or what's keeping you there, reach out to our player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
